Body.Content:
Users will need to have iOS 15 version or higher on their devices to receive the latest updates for the To Do app.

[When this will happen:]

To Do app updates on App Store will have new iOS minimum requirements starting in mid-March 2024.

[How this will affect your organization:]

Users on iOS 14 or lower may no longer be able to receive To Do app updates, when this change is implemented.

[What you need to do to prepare:]

When this change takes effect, you will need to update to iOS 15 or higher to receive app updates.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: To receive To Do app updates, iOS devices must have iOS 15 or higher starting mid-March 2024. Users with iOS 14 or lower may no longer receive updates. Update to iOS 15 or higher to prepare.

Title: Minimum iOS version requirement for To Do app
